name: claude-dashboard (uppinote20)
description: [项目级] Comprehensive status line plugin for Claude Code with context usage, API rate limits, and cost tracking。来源: https://github.com/uppinote20/claude-dashboard

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Comprehensive status line plugin for Claude Code with context usage, API rate limits, and cost tracking

来源: https://github.com/uppinote20/claude-dashboard
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 156

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
commands
commands/check-usage.md
commands/setup.md
commands/update.md
demo.gif
dist
dist/check-usage.js
dist/index.js
images
images/check-usage-json.png
images/check-usage.png
images/compact.png
images/detailed.png
images/normal.png
locales
locales/en.json

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
/claude-dashboard:check-usage              # Interactive output with colors
/claude-dashboard:check-usage --json       # JSON output for scripting
/claude-dashboard:check-usage --lang ko    # Specify language
